channel.title: markdown on Audit, Data Analytics and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in markdown on Audit, Data Analytics and Other Stuff

item.title: Simple Visualizations About Covid19 Cases Using ggplot2
item.description: #R has various ways to visualize data. In my opinion, #ggplot2 is the most elegant, practical and somewhat easy to learn way to do so.

item.title: Covid19 Analysis Tryout
item.description: A simple visualization of Covid19 cases with R, using package tidyverse for the most part.

item.title: Elements showcase
item.description: Check out how Tranquilpeak theme display well HTML elements (title, paragraph, blockquote, table and more..). It’s simple and elegant.
